findings.title: A floating pragma is set (SWC-103)
findings.description: A floating pragma is set which can cause bytecode variation between builds.

findings.title: State Variable Default Visibility
findings.description: State variable visibility is not set

findings.title: Potential use of “block.number” as source of randomness (SWC-120)
findings.description: Using block.number as a source of randomness can be insecure.

findings.title: Owner can set fees up to 100%
findings.description: The owner has the ability to set fees up to 100%, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can set limits
findings.description: The owner has the ability to set limits without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can block users under holderlist via rugNPCs function
findings.description: The owner has the ability to block users under holderlist via the rugNPCs function, which could lead to unintended consequences.
